<Text: April Fools' Day:  The jokes and their victims are called April fools.>

Text: April Fools' Day:  People playing April Fool jokes expose their prank by shouting April Fool.

Text: April Fools' Day:  Some newspapers, magazines, and other published media report fake stories, which are usually explained the next day or below the news section in small letters.
